name: Fake RPS
description:
What is this game?

Middle Ages. There is a struggle of the three kingdoms for influence. You are one of the autocrats. In your kingdom recently, in an incomprehensible way, an unusual assistant has appeared. Is he your friend or vice versa?! You have to find out...

Resources

https://freesound.org/

Tools
  • Unity 2020.3.27f1
  • Aseprite,
  • Bfxr
  • Trello,
  • Visual Studio 2022
  • JetBrains Rider
Authors
  • Kirill Mikhel (game design, programming)
  • Tim Pozdeev (game design, pixel art, sound design)
